Notes: Aoi enters park at night and spots a mysterious girl; unsettling silence.
Ripple distortion effect is triggered as Aoi tries to approach the girl.
Aoi collapses emotionally after confrontation; leads into scene fade.
Kakuen appears in a quiet, dimly lit park; foreshadowing imminent action.
Narrative shifts to protagonist's inner monologue in the same park scene.
Used in early part of confrontation involving Kakuen and Mizuchi.
Scene erupts into battle; Mizuchi shouts for allies to move.
